changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_bank_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_bank_event_log GO
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_bank_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_bank_event_log GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_bank_event_log @id INT, @guild_id dbo.id_t, @vault_id TINYINT, @log_type TINYINT, @player_id dbo.id_t, @param1 INT, @param2 INT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Guild_Bank_Event_Logs SET valult_id = @vault_id, log_type = @log_type, player_id = @player_id, param1 = @param1, param2 = @param2, log_at = GETDATE() WHERE id = @id AND guild_id = @guild_id IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO dbo.Guild_Bank_Event_Logs (id, guild_id, valult_id, log_type, player_id, param1, param2, log_at) VALUES(@id, @guild_id, @vault_id, @log_type, @player_id, @param1, @param2, GETDATE()) END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
